name: Sword Slayer
description:
A troubled kingdom is on the edge of anarchy. The forces of darkness have been awoken by the mystical Enchanter. Once a noble wizard known throughout the world, old age and the pursuit of power has corrupted his soul. His army of the undead are unstoppable and continue to march towards the unarmed tribesmen. The last knight is the youngest of the King's son. With the King's blessed blade in hand, he begins a foolhardy quest to singlehandedly stop an entire army. It cannot be done.

-----------------------
